thread.title: Aidan and Kathleen Cunnane
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Aidan and Kathleen Cunnane

author: Aidan and Kathleen Cunnane
title: Aidan and Kathleen Cunnane
text: The agent who called to me ticked all the "yes" boxes without consulting me, or drawing attention to penalty clause. A short time after joining,- (September 2015) I informed the company that the door of my meter box was broken, I was assured that it would be repaired- at no cost to me, this has not happened. as a result I cannot open it to submit meter reading.
